item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a software engineering student (final year), working with Java mainly and playing with Go. I love backend, writing SAAS, using cloud technologies and discrete math. The topics in software engineering I am the most passionate about is Software Architecture and Software design (i.e. beautiful code). I am currently taking graduate classes at Concordia University in Artifical Inteligence because this domain brings the gap between great fields in mathematics and programing I took the following classes:

item.title: Contact
item.description: Best way to contact me is via email: razine.bensari@gmail.com

item.title: Projects
item.description: Nothing to see here yet… I have worked on a few interesting project but have not had the time to put them here. You can check out my github and send me a message on LinkedIn if you are interested. So far, I have worked on: Mobile Development in React Native: Google map mobile app focused on Concordia University’s campus and indoor directions for students, faculty and staff.
